page.title: 07MORNING AT HOME IN HIGHWOOD
page.content: I USUALLY WAKE AT ABOUT 6.00 AND READ BOOKS WHILE MY DAD IS SHAVING.AT 7.10 I GO DOWNSTAIRS WITH HIM AND HAVE BREAKFAST.I HAVE CORNFLAKES IN A CHINA BOWL WITH SEMI-SKIMMED MILK AND SUGAR.I DRINK A CUPFUL OF MILK AND THEN HAVE TWO PIECES OF BUTTERED TOAST WITH MARMITE AND APRICOT JAM. THEN I GO UPSTAIRS AND PLAY WITH MY TRAINS.AT 8.00 I DO MY PIANO PRACTICE WHILE MY MUM READS BOOKS WITH MY YOUNGER BROTHER JONATHAN.TWENTY MINUTES LATER I GET MY SCHOOL BAG,BRUSH MY HAIR,CLEAN MY TEETH,PUT MY COAT ON AND SAY GOODBYE TO MY MUM. AT 8.35 I WALK TO SCHOOL WITH MY BROTHER AND WE PLAY IN THE PLAYGROUND WHILE WE WAIT FOR THE OTHERS.SOMETIMES I GO INTO SCHOOL TO PRACTICE RECORDERS OR SET THE COMPUTERS UP.I HAVE TO OPEN THE GATE FOR THE TEACHERS' CARS WHEN THEY ARRIVE.
